message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CR, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.IT. 

The paper discusses the vulnerability of deep-learning based classification algorithms to adversarial attacks, which is a common topic in the sub-fields of machine learning (cs.LG), computer security (cs.CR), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), computer vision (cs.CV), and information theory (cs.IT). The paper proposes a general defense method based on information and coding theory, which further supports the relevance of cs.IT. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG, followed by cs.CR, cs.AI, cs.CV, and cs.IT.
